Class AbstractPlay2Mojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractPlay2Mojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Common parent of all Play 2 Mojo

    • Method Detail

      • getPlay2Home

        public String getPlay2Home()
        Gets the specified PLAY2_HOME location. This method checks in this order:
        • the PLAY2_HOME system variable
        • the play2Home settings
        • the PLAY2_HOME environment variable
        If none is set, this method throws an exception.
        Returns:
        the play2 location or null if not specified.

      • getPlay2

        public File getPlay2()
              throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException

      • getEnvironment

        public Map<String,String> getEnvironment()
        Gets the execution environment. This method builds a map containing the Maven properties to give to SBT invocations. It contains maven project data (GAV), pom properties, and system properties.
        Returns:
        the map of properties (
        key -> value
        )

      • getProject

        public org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject getProject()
        Returns:
        the maven project

      • getBuildDirectory

        public File getBuildDirectory()
        Returns:
        the build directory (generally target)

      • getPlay2SystemPropertiesArguments

        public String[] getPlay2SystemPropertiesArguments()
        Returns:
        the array of play2 system properties arguments. The final execution line looks like: play -Dproperty=value -Dproperty2=value2 run/test
